body.p: This section describes NOR Flash memory interface to MPC8306 local bus. Through the general-purpose chip-select machine (GPCM), the MPC8306 SOM provides an 8 MByte of Flash memory using a
chip-select and local bus control signals. Local bus address and data are multiplexed, so a address latch and a data buffer is used between MPC8306 and NOR Flash interface.
